tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Got reference from friend but still had lot of hesitation and reservations since I was visiting first time new dentist at a new location,   that too, for  major dental treatment. ( implants and full fixed dentures ) However now my treatment is completed and I am very HAPPY and FULLY SATISFIED with treatment.  I am able to eat as good as I was with my Natural Teeth. Now my family visits her for any Dental advice and treatment. 
 I would strongly recommend Dr Rasleen for any Dental treatment.  
Thanks to Dr Rasleen Ahuja for providing me the best treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review:
Having treated by her, I am 100% satisfied with my detal implant. Though the process was quite involved but Dr jasleen's explanation *** ***** ****** made the whole process extremely smooth. I am absolutely sure that the implant is going to last ages. With a caveat; that I follow her instruction religiously; which I am following.

I can only recommend her with highest regards. Worth the money and time.
Moreover, City dental have the setup to pull off the most complicated cases. I am an example of the same. 

Thank you.
reply_text: Thank you so much sir for the kind words. Regards
